---
description: "Template for an Issue in GitHub for an Epic"
---

## Issue Title

{ E1 } { Epic 1 Short Name }

## Issue Description

````markdown
# { E1 } { Epic 1 Short Name }

{ Epic 1 Short Description }

````

## Issue labeling

- [ ] Label issue as `epic`

- [ ] Label issues based on priority:
  - `priority: ‼️ Critical`
  - `priority: ❗ High`
  - `priority: ❕ Normal`
